sentences.cn: 一段景色优美的海岸线

sentences.en: Birds, sea-life and the coastline all suffered grievously.
sentences.cn: 鸟类、海洋生物及沿海生物均受到严重影响。

sentences.en: Britain's coastline stretches 4000 kilometres and much of it is crumbling away.
sentences.cn: 英国的海岸线绵延4,000公里，其中大部分正在逐渐沉陷。
加利福尼亚崎岖的海岸线

sentences.en: Dangerous undertows make swimming unsafe along most of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 由于存在着危险的下层逆流，在大部分海岸线附近游泳都不安全。

sentences.en: Islands are scattered all along China's coastline like stars in the sky.
sentences.cn: 中国沿海岛屿星罗棋布.

sentences.en: The beautiful sweeping coastline was cloaked in mist.
sentences.cn: 美丽的海岸线一望无际，笼罩在迷雾之中。

sentences.en: The coastline tends to the south here.
sentences.cn: 海岸线从此处转向南方.

sentences.en: The oil washed ashore on roughly 1,000 miles of coastline.
sentences.cn: 石油沿着海岸线扩散到了大约1,000英里范围的沿岸海域。

sentences.en: The road follows the natural contours of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 这条路沿着海岸线的自然轮廓延伸。

sentences.en: The road follows the Pacific coastline.
sentences.cn: 公路沿着太平洋海岸线延伸.

sentences.en: The sea is eating away the coastline.
The tug was seaward of the Hakai Passage on a course that diverged from the Calvert Island coastline.
sentences.cn: 托船驶离卡尔弗特岛海岸朝哈凯航道驶去。

sentences.en: They admired the rugged beauty of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 他们对海岸线上岩石密布的美景赞叹不已。

sentences.en: They sailed along the rugged coastline.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着多岩石的海岸线航行.

sentences.en: This is some of the most exposed coastline in the world.
sentences.cn: 这里的海岸线属于世界上最无遮蔽的一段了。

sentences.en: We watched the harbour and then the coastline fade away into the morning mist.
sentences.cn: 我们凝望着港口，只见海岸线渐渐隐于晨雾之中。

trans.tran_cn: 海岸线，海岸地形（或轮廓）
trans.tran_en: the land on the edge of the coast, especially the shape of this land as seen from the air
